# init(bufferTypeCode:model:)

**Initializer**

Creates a buffer type enumeration from the specified code and color space model.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(bufferTypeCode: Int, model: CGColorSpaceModel?)
```
title: init(bufferTypeCode:model:)
